籤詩版本二:
Kuthiwa akusiyo into engaqhelekanga, iimpahla ezintle kunye nomvuzo omhle uya kukhokelela ekuchumeni
Awukhumbuli ukuba kwenzeka ntoni emva koko. Usavumelana nam.
詩意:
Le hexagram ngumfanekiso womntwana obona unina.
Ithamsanqa kubo bonke abantu abahloniphekileyo.
解曰: Isetyenziselwa ithemba. Wonke umntu wonwabile. Ukusuka kumkhosi woluntu. Njengonyana edibana nomama wakhe.
籤詩故事一:
◇UDong Zhong ukhangela izalamane
U-Dong Zhong wayengunyana ka-Dong Yong kuNdlunkulu wakwa-Han, wazalwa yintsomi evela ezulwini eyehla emhlabeni izotshata no-Dong Yong. Kamva, emva kokuba intsomi incede uDong Yong ukuba ahlawule amatyala akhe aze azikhulule, wabuyela ezulwini.
UDong Zhong, owayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala, wayesoloko ethotywa isidima kuba wayengenanina, ngoko wayefuna ukumfumana.
Ngaphantsi kolwalathiso lukaMnu Yi, u-Dong Zhong waya kwiNtaba yaseTaibai ukuba amkhangele ngoJulayi 7. I-fairy yabonakala kwaye ekugqibeleni yabona unina.
聖意: Andixolanga ekhaya ndingumntu oqhelekileyo ndithandazela amathamsanqa, ithamsanqa kwishishini, umtshato kunye nomtshato, ibhinqa elihamba ngeenyawo eLiujia livalela amasimi, i-silkworms isengxakini, kunzima ukufumana abantu ngenxa ukulahlekelwa yimfuyo, kunzima ukufaka isimangalo, ukufuduka kuyagcinwa, impahla elahlekileyo ayinanto, izifo zithandazela inhlanhla ezintabeni nasemangcwabeni.
